snippet.title: Slipstream Official Trailer - Available Now on PS4|5, XBOX, Nintendo Switch and Steam!
snippet.description:
Buy Slipstream at: https://blitworks.com/games/slipstream
Arcade racer Slipstream launches this April 7th on XBOX One, Series S|X, PlayStation 4|5 and Nintendo Switch at a price of 9.99 USD | 8.99 EUR. The game has been created during 4 years by Brazilian solo developer Sandro Luiz de Paula (ansdor), who built his own custom game engine that recreates the sprite scaling graphic techniques used on 80s and 90s racing games to bring the real, authentic retro experience to modern hardware, taking advantage of the extra power to provide smooth, constant 60fps gameplay.

GAME FEATURES:

- Authentic pseudo-3D game engine with 2D pixelart graphics, just like the glory days of the arcade racers.
- Local multiplayer up to 4 players split-screen!
- Time rewinding - Now you can go back in time for a few seconds and maybe undo the mistake that led to a crash or bad move, think strategically, as this feature has limited availability.
- Game Speed Control - Players can reduce the global game speed up to 50%, giving them more time to react to the race (and enjoy the scenery), but the physics and gameplay will remain exactly the same.
- 20 Different tracks, set on a variety of exotic locations all around the world... and beyond.
- 6 Game modes:
1. Grand Tour, a road trip through exotic landscapes, with branching paths and rivals to race against.
2. Cannonball, a freely customizable race mode with optional traffic, rivals and other racers.
3. Grand Prix, a championship mode with five races back to back and money prizes used to upgrade your car!
4. Single Race, just a race in any of the game's 20 tracks.
5. Time Trial, a solo race against time.
6. Battle Royale, an elimination endurance race mode.
- 5 Car models, each with its own specs and playstyle.
- Original soundtrack with 9 exclusive songs.
- A variety of graphical options to customize the game's visuals, including 30fps mode, CRT and NTSC filters.
